DOC.brief_summary: A group midwives obstetric nurse train use circumferential abdominal pelvic pressure ( CAPP ) treat postpartum hemorrhage . As part training follow use CAPP device monitor identify complication .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Trial Circumferential Abdominal Pelvic Pressure Device ( CAPP )
DOC.detailed_description: Providers survey twice 4 8 month use open end method .
DOC.criteria: Any patient receiving CAPP study period . None ( CAPP clinically indicate obstetric hemorrhage post delivery .
